resources.string: Records sound for a set period of time and then calculates the average volume for that period. The mic\'s auto start threshold is then set accordingly. A lower value means less sound is needed for the mic to start recording.
The IP address of the server that will handle the "Open Door" command
The Port that the server listening on for commands

The type of algorithm to use for face recognition. Eigenfaces is very sensitive to lighting conditions. Fisherfaces is less sensitive to lighting conditions but requires at least 8 or more photos do be accurate. Local Binary Patterns Histograms is the most accurate on a small number of images and is the default algorithm to use.
Number of photos that will be automatically taken per person and will be trained on. More photos will increase accuracy of recognition, less photos will be faster.
Number of photos in a row which should be the same person for the system to authenticate the user. This is to prevent nose data. Higher value will be more accurate, lower value will be faster.

Threshold value for the facial recognition algorithm. A higher value will make the threshold less strict and allow more people in. Too low value will lock everyone out. This value is also dependent on the resolution of the camera.
The amount to scale the resolution of the image down for face, nose and eyes detection. Higher value will increase speed but lower accuracy.
List of all the possible resolutions supported by the fron facing camera. A higher value will have higher accuracy and larger file size of images stored. A lower value will improve performance.
The threshold used for the group rectangle algorithm. A higher value will group more rectangles. A value of 0 will group no rectangles.
Disables or Enables eye detection. When enabled a user will only be added when 2 eyes are detected.
Disables or Enables nose detection. When enabled a user will only be added when 1 nose is detected.
The Consumer Key that can be retrieved from dev.twitter once you set up the application
The Consumer Secret that can be retrieved from dev.twitter once you set up the application
The Access Token that can be retrieved from dev.twitter once you set up the application
The Access Token Secret that can be retrieved from dev.twitter once you set up the application
Enter face name, then pres Rec
More then one face is needed to predict
